trans-unit.source: Represents a class that is used to configure how the service authenticates users that use user name/password authentication and to configure the caching of logon tokens.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una classe che viene utilizzata per configurare la modalità con cui il servizio autentica gli utenti che utilizzano l'autenticazione di nome e password utente e per configurare la memorizzazione nella cache dei token di accesso.

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured for user name/password-based authentication, the relevant properties for this class are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se nessuna delle associazioni usate da un servizio viene configurata per l'autenticazione basata su nome/password utente, le proprietà rilevanti per questa classe vengono ignorate.

trans-unit.source: These properties include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Queste proprietà includono il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured to use Windows authentication for user name/password, the settings related to caching of logon tokens are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se nessuna delle associazioni usate da un servizio viene configurata per utilizzare l'autenticazione di Windows per nome utente/password, le impostazioni relative alla memorizzazione nella cache dei token di accesso vengono ignorate.

trans-unit.source: These settings include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Queste impostazioni includono la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum length of time that a token is cached.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la lunghezza massima di tempo in cui un token viene memorizzato nella cache.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that represents the maximum length of time that a token is cached`.` The default is 15 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.TimeSpan>che rappresenta la lunghezza massima di tempo in cui è memorizzato nella cache un token`.` il valore predefinito è 15 minuti.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether logon tokens are cached.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se i token di accesso vengono memorizzati nella cache.

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] security asks the Windows security subsystem to create a logon token for every incoming user name/password security token if the user name is being mapped to a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] sicurezza chiede il sottosistema di sicurezza di Windows per creare un token di accesso per ogni token di sicurezza/password nome utente in ingresso, se il nome utente verrà mappato a un account di Windows.

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo comportamento può essere modificato impostando la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses Win32's `LogonUser` function for user name/password authentication.
trans-unit.target: Per <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>modalità, il servizio utilizza Win32 `LogonUser` funzione per l'autenticazione di nome e password utente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: If the CacheLogonTokens is set to `true`, the resulting Windows token is cached and reused for the same user name/password pair.
trans-unit.target: Se il CacheLogonTokens è impostata su `true`, il token di Windows risultante viene memorizzato nella cache e riutilizzato per la stessa coppia nome/password utente.

trans-unit.source: The cache is valid for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La cache è valida per <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of caches is limited to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero massimo di cache è limitato a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if logon tokens are cached; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se i token di accesso vengono memorizzati nella cache; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un validator di nome e una password utente personalizzata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>proprietà deve essere impostata su <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>per il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>diventino effettive.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>proprietà è impostata e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>proprietà, non è [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] utilizza l'autenticazione di Windows e ignora il valore della <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>modalità, il servizio utilizza <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>per l'autenticazione di nome/password chiamando il <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A>metodo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: A custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: Un validator di nome e una password utente personalizzata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows groups are included in the security context.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se i gruppi di Windows sono inclusi nel contesto di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: In most scenarios when validating Windows user names and passwords, Windows groups in which users belong provide useful information for authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: Nella maggior parte degli scenari durante la convalida di nomi utente di Windows e password, gruppi di Windows in cui appartengono gli utenti forniscono informazioni utili per prendere decisioni di autorizzazione.

trans-unit.source: However, if the Windows groups are not required, setting this property to `false` can improve performance by avoiding a full-group claim population.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se i gruppi di Windows non sono obbligatori, impostando questa proprietà su `false` può migliorare le prestazioni evitando un popolamento delle attestazioni basate sul gruppo completo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Windows groups are included in the security context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se i gruppi di Windows sono inclusi nel contesto di sicurezza. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il numero massimo di token di accesso da memorizzare nella cache.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 128.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 128.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: Numero massimo di token di accesso da memorizzare nella cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il provider di appartenenze.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>modalità, il servizio utilizza <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>per l'autenticazione di nome/password chiamando il <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> for the MembershipProvider to take effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>proprietà deve essere impostata su <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>per MembershipProvider diventino effettive.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the MembershipProvider property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the MembershipProvider property.
trans-unit.target: Quando è impostata la proprietà MembershipProvider e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>proprietà non lo è, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] utilizza l'autenticazione di Windows e ignora il valore della proprietà MembershipProvider.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> property is set to `MembershipProvider` and the `MembershipProvider` property is not set to a value, the default is the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>è impostata su `MembershipProvider` e `MembershipProvider` non è impostata su un valore, il valore predefinito è la <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>classe</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for this service.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>per questo servizio.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref href="System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è il <xref href="System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Un tentativo di impostare questa proprietà quando la credenziale è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method of validating the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il metodo di convalida il nome utente e password.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> If this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, the service uses the object returned by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> to validate user names and passwords in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: I valori possibili sono:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>Se questa proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, il servizio utilizza l'oggetto restituito da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>per convalidare i nomi utente e password nei messaggi in arrivo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service is hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS) using transport-level security and the UserNamePasswordValidationMode property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, the custom authentication scheme uses a subset of Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando un [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] servizio è ospitato in Internet Information Services (IIS) utilizzando la sicurezza a livello di trasporto e la proprietà UserNamePasswordValidationMode è impostata su <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, lo schema di autenticazione personalizzato utilizza un sottoinsieme dell'autenticazione di Windows.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: That is because in this scenario, IIS performs Windows authentication prior to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] invoking the custom authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Questo avviene perché in questo scenario, IIS esegue l'autenticazione di Windows prima di [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] richiamando l'autenticatore personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, specify the membership provider by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property, and then the membership provider instance specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is used to validate the username and password in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: Quando il valore di questa proprietà è impostato su <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, specificare il provider di appartenenze impostando il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>proprietà, quindi l'istanza del provider di appartenenze specificato da di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>proprietà viene utilizzata per convalidare il nome utente e password nei messaggi in arrivo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration in <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore dall'enumerazione in <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode"> </xref>.
